articles.author: Tamantha Ryan
articles.title: Michael Strahan gives update on daughter Isabella's brain tumor battle after setback: 'She's a tough young lady' - Page Six
articles.description: “The last three days have been a little rough because she had a fever that kind of comes and goes,” he said on “Good Morning America” Wednesday.
articles.content:
Michael Strahan gave an update on his daughter Isabella’s brain tumor battle following a recent hospitalization after starting chemotherapy.
